name: Wizard Shmup (Port)
description:
A quick HTML5 port of an old shootemup + endless runner prototype I made. Game supports mouse and keyboard, and *should* work with XInput controllers. 1-4 player couch co-op supported.

Keyboard controls:
Navigate menu with WASD/Arrows + Space/Enter to Select
Move - Arrow Keys
Shoot - Left Mouse/WASD
Shoot (No Direction) - Middle Mouse/Q
Use Scroll - Right Mouse/E
Abilities - 1/2/3/4
Pause - Enter
Drop Scroll - R
Drop Staff - F
Toggle HUD - Tab
